operations.details: Repository files (80+ files including large keystones)
Gas system analysis and implementation planning

session_metadata.notes: Focused on repository optimization, identified significant redundancy in gas system. Created consolidated team-dynamics file. Planned gas system consolidation with three-phase approach. Warning threshold proved predictive rather than reactive, occurring just as implementation planning was completed.

gas_system: Observable indicators CONFIRMED as primary approach
Buffer rules DEPRECATED (redundant with long chats warning)
Mobile optimization UNNECESSARY for gas system specifically

strategic_insights.gas_system_architecture: Observable indicators confirmed as primary approach, ping measurement deprecated completely
strategic_insights.directory_structure: Successfully flattened to reduce nesting depth with human implementation
strategic_insights.implementation_strategy: Three-phase approach defined with detailed ROI calculations
strategic_insights.warning_threshold_behavior: Long chats warning appears predictively based on anticipated operations
strategic_insights.technical_debt_identified: ~65% of gas system code is redundant or obsolete (67.28 KB)
